entry.source: Good work getting through all those tough{F801}training exercises. This will be the final{F801}Training Battle. {F804,5}Defeat an enemy group{F801}that uses a deadly attack under certain{F801}conditions within 10 turns.{F804,0} Show me how{F801}you've improved by completing this final{F801}mission.{F801}
